enumeratedValues.name: DQSMD_1
enumeratedValues.description: Dummy read strobe loopbacked from DQS pad

enumeratedValues.name: MUX_A8_0
enumeratedValues.description: SDRAM Address bit 8 (A8) or NOR/SRAM Address bit 24 (A24) in ADMUX 16bit mode

enumeratedValues.name: MUX_A8_5
enumeratedValues.description: SDRAM Address bit 8 (A8) or NOR/SRAM Address bit 24 (A24) in ADMUX 16bit mode

enumeratedValues.name: MUX_A8_6
enumeratedValues.description: SDRAM Address bit 8 (A8) or NOR/SRAM Address bit 24 (A24) in ADMUX 16bit mode

enumeratedValues.name: MUX_A8_7
enumeratedValues.description: SDRAM Address bit 8 (A8) or NOR/SRAM Address bit 24 (A24) in ADMUX 16bit mode

WSH.name: WSH
WSH.description: Weight of Slave Hit without read/write switch

WRWS.name: WRWS
WRWS.description: Weight of slave hit with Read/Write Switch

WRWS.name: WRWS
WRWS.description: Weight of slave hit without Read/Write Switch

enumeratedValues.name: VLD_0
enumeratedValues.description: The memory is invalid, can not be accessed.

enumeratedValues.name: VLD_1
enumeratedValues.description: The memory is valid, can be accessed.

enumeratedValues.name: OVRDEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: The delay cell number is not overridden.

enumeratedValues.name: OVRDEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: The delay cell number is overridden.

NDNOPENDEN.name: NDNOPENDEN
NDNOPENDEN.description: NAND no pending AXI access interrupt enable

enumeratedValues.name: NDPAGEEND_0
enumeratedValues.description: The last address of main space in the NAND is not written by AXI command.

enumeratedValues.name: NDPAGEEND_1
enumeratedValues.description: The last address of main space in the NAND is written by AXI command.

NDNOPEND.name: NDNOPEND
NDNOPEND.description: NAND no pending AXI write transaction interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: NDNOPEND_0
enumeratedValues.description: At least one NAND AXI write transaction is pending or no NAND write transaction is sent to the queue.

enumeratedValues.name: NDNOPEND_1
enumeratedValues.description: All NAND AXI write pending transactions are finished.

enumeratedValues.name: COL8_0
enumeratedValues.description: Column address bit number is decided by COL field.

enumeratedValues.name: COL8_1
enumeratedValues.description: Column address bit number is 8. COL field is ignored.

PRE2ACT.name: PRE2ACT
PRE2ACT.description: PRECHARGE to ACTIVE/REFRESH command wait time

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_1
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_2
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_3
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_4
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_5
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_6
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_7
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_8
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: ITO_9
enumeratedValues.description: IDLE timeout period is ITO*Prescale period.

enumeratedValues.name: REN_0
enumeratedValues.description: The SEMC does not send AUTO REFRESH command automatically

enumeratedValues.name: REN_1
enumeratedValues.description: The SEMC sends AUTO REFRESH command automatically

TWHR.name: TWHR
TWHR.description: WE# high to RE# low time

TRHW.name: TRHW
TRHW.description: RE# high to WE# low time

TADL.name: TADL
TADL.description: Address cycle to data loading time

enumeratedValues.name: SYNCEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Synchronous mode is enabled. Only fixed latency mode is supported.

ADVH.name: ADVH
ADVH.description: ADV# level control during address hold state

enumeratedValues.name: ADVH_0
enumeratedValues.description: ADV# is high during address hold state.

enumeratedValues.name: ADVH_1
enumeratedValues.description: ADV# is low during address hold state.

AWDH.name: AWDH
AWDH.description: Address to write data hold time

ASSR.name: ASSR
ASSR.description: Address setup time for SYNC read

AHSR.name: AHSR
AHSR.description: Address hold time for SYNC read

enumeratedValues.name: SYNCEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Synchronous mode is enabled. Only fixed latency mode is supported.

ADVH.name: ADVH
ADVH.description: ADV# level control during address hold state

enumeratedValues.name: ADVH_0
enumeratedValues.description: ADV# is high during address hold state.

enumeratedValues.name: ADVH_1
enumeratedValues.description: ADV# is low during address hold state.

AWDH.name: AWDH
AWDH.description: Address to write data hold time

CMD.name: CMD
CMD.description: SDRAM Commands: 0x8: Read 0x9: Write 0xA: Mode Register Set 0xB: Active 0xC: Auto Refresh 0xD: Self Refresh 0xE: Precharge 0xF: Precharge All Others: Reserved Self Refresh is sent to all SDRAM devices because they share the same SEMC_CLK pin

KEY.name: KEY
KEY.description: This field should be written with 0xA55A when trigging an IP command for all device types

DAT.name: DAT
DAT.description: Data value to use for an IP write command

DAT.name: DAT
DAT.description: Data returned by device for an IP read command.

IDLE.name: IDLE
IDLE.description: Indicating whether the SEMC is in idle state.

NARDY.name: NARDY
NARDY.description: Indicating NAND device Ready/WAIT# pin level.

NDWRPEND.name: NDWRPEND
NDWRPEND.description: This field indicating whether there is pending AXI command (write) to NAND device.

NDADDR.name: NDADDR
NDADDR.description: This field indicating the last write address (AXI command) to NAND device (without base address in SEMC_BR4).

SLVLOCK.name: SLVLOCK
SLVLOCK.description: Sample clock slave delay line locked.

enumeratedValues.name: SLVLOCK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Slave delay line is not locked.

REFLOCK.name: REFLOCK
REFLOCK.description: Sample clock reference delay line locked.

enumeratedValues.name: REFLOCK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Reference delay line is not locked.

SLVSEL.name: SLVSEL
SLVSEL.description: Sample clock slave delay line delay cell number selection.

REFSEL.name: REFSEL
REFSEL.description: Sample clock reference delay line delay cell number selection.
